name: Doggy Snake
description:
This dog is long. Really really long. Also very excitable, and a bit loopy. But it’s not that bright, so it needs your help to reach its one goal in life - to chase its own tail!

Doggy Snake is a simple but challenging puzzle game. Slide the dog around and through 22 levels.

Further development of this game is on hold, but you can still play the current version on Android through Google Play.
